videos.headline: Tua finds Waddle for 21-yard TD
videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa finds Jaylen Waddle wide open in the end zone for Alabama's first points of the day.

videos.headline: Citadel shocks Bama with long TD run
videos.description: Dante Smith gets the ball on the option and runs 45 yards down the sideline to tie up Alabama at 7 in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Harris hurdles defender on long run
videos.description: Najee Harris hurdles a defender on his way to a 32-yard run for the Crimson Tide.

videos.headline: Alabama fumbles away 2nd-half kickoff
videos.description: Alabama fumbles the second half kickoff leading to The Citadel taking over in Crimson Tide territory to start the third quarter.

videos.headline: Bama restores lead on Waddle TD
videos.description: Tua Tagovailoa finds Jaylen Waddle in the corner of the end zone as Alabama takes the lead over The Citadel 17-10 in the third quarter.

videos.headline: Bama returns fumble for TD
videos.description: Alab Anfernee Jennings picks up the fumble and runs it 18 yards for a Tide touchdown.

videos.headline: Smith breaks ankles on Bama TD
videos.description: Irv Smith Jr. jukes the defender as he runs 68 yards for a Crimson Tide touchdown.

videos.headline: Alabama surges past Citadel in second half
videos.description: After entering the break tied, Alabama found its way in the second half to win big 50-17.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Alabama surges past Citadel in second half) 2018/11/17 SOTFULL ESHEET
